data.name: start_tour
data.say: Welcome to the 11911 Freedom Life Safety Training. You can start the tour right away or take a quick tutorial

krpano.data:
5404 Wisconsin Safety Training
Click Here for a Quick Tutorial on How to Use this Tool
Click Here to Start the Tour


It is highly recommended to take the tutorial if this is your first time using the program.

data.name: pause_play
data.say: Use the pause play button to control media playback

krpano.data: Pause / Play Fast Forward and Rewind Tour Home Tour On / Off

data.name: rewind
data.say: Use the fast forward and rewind buttons to review previously viewed steps in the tour

krpano.data: Pause / Play Fast Forward and Rewind Tour Home Tour On / Off

data.name: tour_home
data.say: Use the tour home button to return to the beginning of the tour

krpano.data: Pause / Play Fast Forward and Rewind Tour Home Tour On / Off

data.name: tour_toggle
data.say: Toggle the tour on and off at any time to enter explore mode. Your progress will be saved automatically

krpano.data: Pause / Play Fast Forward and Rewind Tour Home Tour On / Off

data.name: hardware_chooser
data.say: Select If You Are On Mobile or Desktop

krpano.data:
Select If You Are On Mobile or Desktop.
Desktop Mobile

data.name: desktop_intro
data.say: Hold down your left mouse button to move the camera around

krpano.data: Hold down your left mouse button to move the camera around

data.name: desk_zoom
data.say: Scroll mouse wheel up or down to zoom.

krpano.data: Scroll mouse wheel up or down to zoom.

data.name: desk_hud
data.say: Use the Emergency Equipment Heads Up Display to find emergency equipment in the current location. The icons will light up when life safety items are nearby. When an icon is lit, you can click on it to automatically face the life safety item.

krpano.data: Use the Emergency Equipment Heads Up Display to find emergency equipment in the current location. The icons will light up when life safety items are nearby. When an icon is lit, you can click on it to automatically face the life safety item.

data.name: desk_portals
data.say: Click the arrows to select the direction you would like to go

krpano.data: Click the arrows to select the direction you would like to go

data.name: mobile_intro
data.say: With 1 finger, drag around the screen to move the camera

krpano.data: With 1 finger, drag around the screen to move the camera

data.name: mobile_zoom
data.say: Pinch the screen to zoom in and out

krpano.data: Pinch the screen to zoom in and out

data.name: mobile_pinch
data.say: Pinch the screen to zoom in and out

krpano.data: Pinch the screen to zoom in and out

data.name: mobile_hud
data.say: Use the Emergency Equipment Heads Up Display to find emergency equipment in the current location. The icons will light up when life safety items are nearby. When an icon is lit, you can tap on it to automatically face the life safety item.

krpano.data: Use the Emergency Equipment Heads Up Display to find emergency equipment in the current location. The icons will light up when life safety items are nearby. When an icon is lit, you can tap on it to automatically face the life safety item.

data.name: mobile_portal
data.say: Tap the arrow to move around the model

krpano.data: Tap the arrow to move around the model

data.name: next_ani
data.say: Select the appropriate tour based on what floor you occupy.

data.name: bxp_intro_tour
data.say: Let's take a quick tour of your floor to locate the stairwells and life safety equipment. First let's head to Stairwell 1.

krpano.data: Let's take a quick tour of your floor to locate the stairwells and life safety equipment. First let's head to Stairwell 1.

data.name: bxp_exit_sign
data.say: Exit paths are clearly marked with an illuminated sign.

krpano.data: Exit paths are clearly marked with an illuminated sign.

data.name: bxp_pull
data.say: Manual pull stations will put the entire building into alarm and notify the fire department.

krpano.data: Manual pull stations will put the entire building into alarm and notify the fire department.

data.name: bxp_stair_1
data.say: Stairwell 1 serves penthouse to ground level and exits into the lobby.

krpano.data: Stairwell 1 serves penthouse to ground level and exits into the lobby.

data.name: bxp_defib
data.say: This automated external defibrillator (AED) which comes with step-by-step instructions should you ever need to use it.

krpano.data: This automated external defibrillator (AED) which comes with step-by-step instructions should you ever need to use it.

data.name: bxp_fire_ext
data.say: Fire extinguishers are located throughout the building. After this tour is over, click on one to learn how to use it.

krpano.data: Fire extinguishers are located throughout the building. After this tour is over, click on one to learn how to use it.

data.name: bxp_first_aid
data.say: This First Aid Station contains basic supplies for minor conditions. Please seek professional medical help for serious injuries or ailments.

krpano.data: This First Aid Station contains basic supplies for minor conditions. Please seek professional medical help for serious injuries or ailments.

data.name: bxp_stair_2
data.say: Stairwell 2 serves penthouse to ground level and exits into the lobby. Next let's head to Stairwell 1.

krpano.data: Stairwell 2 serves penthouse to ground level and exits into the lobby. Next let's head to Stairwell 1.

data.name: bxp_evac
data.say: Should you ever need to evacuate the building do not use the elevators. Head to the nearest stairwell, go down to the lobby level and exit the building. Then proceed to your designated primary external assembly area.

krpano.data: Should you ever need to evacuate the building do not use the elevators. Head to the nearest stairwell, go down to the lobby level and exit the building. Then proceed to your designated primary external assembly area.

data.name: f2_exit_bldg
data.say: Click Here to Exit the Building.

krpano.data: Click Here to Exit the Building

data.name: f5_exit_bldg
data.say: Click Here to Exit the Building.

krpano.data: Click Here to Exit the Building

data.name: f8_exit_bldg
data.say: Click Here to Exit the Building.

krpano.data:
Click Here to Exit the Building
Click Here to Exit the Building

data.name: interface_items
data.say: Before you start exploring your floor there are a few additional items to point out.

krpano.data: Before you start exploring your floor there are a few additional items to point out.

data.name: shuttle_menu
data.say: This is the Floor Feature Menu

krpano.data: Floor Feature Menu Icon

data.name: shuttle_menu_info
data.say: Within the Floor Feature Menu click on the blue text or icon to automatically move to that specific floor feature.

krpano.data: Within the Floor Feature Menu click on the blue text or icon to automatically move to that specific floor feature.

data.name: vid_lib
data.say: You can learn how to use emergency equipment by watching training videos available via the library

krpano.data: Video Library

data.name: vid_lib_info
data.say: Within the Video Library Menu click on the blue text to watch life safety feature videos.

krpano.data: Within the Video Library Menu click on the blue text to watch life safety feature videos.

data.name: mini_map
data.say: Click on the minimap to view your entire floor and the location of all your safety features.

krpano.data: Mini Map

data.name: flr2_tour_over
data.say: This guided tour is now over, and you will be returned to the starting point of the tour. Take a minute to navigate this floor, locate all life safety equipment. After the tour is completed, click on the double cyan arrows to start exploring your building.

krpano.data:
This guided tour is now over, and you will be returned to the starting point of the tour. Take a minute to navigate this floor, locate all life safety equipment. After the tour is completed, click on the double cyan arrows to start exploring your building.
